job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Requirements: Ph.D/Masters/Bachelors degree in a quantitative field such as Mathematics, Physics, Finance, Engineering or Statistics 4 years of professional experience as a Data Scientist or related roles Hands-on experience with Statistical Modeling/Machine Learning/Deep Learning techniques is must Should be well-versed in programming languages of R/Python/SAS and be familiar with Deep Learning Frameworks like Tensorflow/Pytorch Sound knowledge of financial instruments and financial risk/operational risk management principles is must Ability to understand and implement techniques discussed in AI research papers (academic and technical) Candidates must have any of financial certifications like CFA, FRM (at least level 1/part 1 should have been cleared) MBA is not required but preferred
